#summary How to join the Google Groups mailing list for PRMF

We use the mailing list to co-ordinate our communication.

 # First go to http://groups.google.com/group/programming-mafia/
 # Click "Sign in and Apply for Memebership"
 # Enter a nickname you want to use (if you never used Groups before)
 # Select your mailing list frequency (digest, etc)
 # An admin will approve you shortly
